Hydras:

Hydras leaded Maxima towas the mess hall, there was alot  chairs and tables 
around. Hydras took two glasses full of liquid energon and offer one to 
Maxima.

He sat down in a corder, that was just for Hydras and motioned Maxima to 
saat down in one chair in the same table. Hydras dramk a abit of energon and 
said "Tripedocus and Maximals are allied but is a weak alliance..." But a 
devil smile arose in his face"But I have a plan that will let me have 
ROdimus Prime in my grasp...."
